reviewText: My kids love Peg and Cat!
My son really loves this show. It is a great introduction to math and counting for preschoolers.
Peg + Cat is my 3 year olds favorite.  Filled with so many songs, and math problems explained in easily understandable ways.  I wish it was around when I was a kids, I would have done better in math.

Amazon's description is lacking.  Here's the list of episodes from the PBS website.  (There are no special features.)

EPISODES
The Pirate Puzzle Problem - The Pirate Ship. Peg and Cat must help the pirates put together a puzzle, and then the four sections of their sinking ship.

The Scrap of Map Problem - Pirate Island. When the Pirates' treasure map is torn and carried off by the wind, Peg and Cat and friends from far and wide put their scraps of map together to find the treasure.

The Pirate Problem - Pirate Island. Peg and Cat show a group of very hungry Pirates how to share tropical fruit fairly.

The Sleepover Problem - Peg's House. When the Pirates are having a sleepover at Peg's house, they get scared at bedtime. Peg and Cat help the Pirates fall asleep by counting chickens.

The Buried Treasure Problem - Pirate Island. Peg and Cat measure their way to buried treasure using Cat as a measuring stick!

The Perfect Ten Problem - TV Show Set. Peg and Cat are judging a singing competition in which all performers must get a rating of exactly ten stars.

The Pizza Pirate Problem - Peg's Pizza Place/Giant Land/ Prehistoric Valley/Ancient Egypt. As Peg and Cat deliver pizzas far and wide, they are menaced by the flying Pizza Pirates who are determined to "take away one!"

This DVD features Descriptive Video for the Visually Impaired

This DVD features subtitles in English (SDH)
kids love this show, fun and educational
My son enjoys this movie immensely
My son loves this series! Great buy :)

This DVD is sure Full of Awesome Stories about Peg + Cat and the 4 Pirates who are sure very Funny! Peg + Cat sure do a Great and Amazing Job helping the Pirates in these different Stories that can be Great Favorites for all those who Love stories about pirates and who also love different kinds of Math. :D
Peg plus cat is the best! It's so funny, teaches them math and problem solving, with good attitudes and it's very cute aesthetic is nice too. We love Peg!
The DVD continues the mathematical adventures of Peg, Cat and all their friends. My nieces who are 3 and 6 watch it a number of times each week and have lots of fun every time.
LOVE this for long car trips.....
